title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull & manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, admin, model management) installable via Docker.

title: ollama4j – Java Ollama Client
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin SDK exposing chat, pull, delete, listing and embedding APIs.

title: OllamaSharp – .NET client
summary: C# wrapper that brings Ollama chat, models and embeddings to .NET 6+ applications.

title: ollama-rails – Ruby gem
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST endpoints; drop-in for Rails or plain Ruby apps.

title: ollama-cli – Rust TUI
summary: Fast Rust CLI/TUI for interactive chatting and model management over Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot – VS Code extension
summary: Bring local Ollama models into VS Code inline chat and completion workflows.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistent model storage.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module spinning up Ollama on EC2 with CUDA drivers and optional public endpoint.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF Q&A, function-calling, RAG, fine-tune flows all using Ollama.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to your server via Ollama.

title: ollama-elasticsearch
summary: Logstash output and Elasticsearch ingest processor using Ollama for local text embeddings.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private or channel LLM conversations.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component for chatting with Ollama models inside data apps with session memory.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rag – minimal retrieval repo
summary: Tiny RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local docs offline.
